skill.name: learn
skill.description: Extract and persist insights from the current conversation to the knowledge base
skill.summary: Extract and persist insights from the current conversation to the knowledge base
skill.author: 0xrdan

security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based documentation skill. Contains only SKILL.md with instructions to analyze conversations and write markdown files. No executable code, network requests, or command execution. All 35 static findings are false positives caused by scanner malfunctioning on markdown text and metadata. Original security audit correctly identified zero risk factors.

content.value_statement: Project insights are lost when sessions end. This skill extracts patterns, quirks, and decisions from conversations and persists them to a knowledge base that survives context compaction and new sessions.
actual_capabilities: Extracts patterns from successful problem-solving approaches
Documents quirks and unexpected behaviors discovered in the codebase
Records architectural decisions with their rationale
Updates markdown files in knowledge/learnings/ directory
Reports extracted insights in a formatted summary
limitations: Only extracts insights from the current conversation
Does not generate code or execute commands
Requires the knowledge/learnings/ directory to exist
Does not analyze code directly, only conversation context

use_cases.title: Build project memory
use_cases.description: Capture team decisions and patterns so future sessions understand project conventions automatically

use_cases.title: Train context-aware AI
use_cases.description: Help AI assistants understand project-specific quirks and avoid repeated mistakes

use_cases.title: Document institutional knowledge
use_cases.description: Preserve architectural rationale and design choices for onboarding and long-term maintenance

prompt_templates.title: Record a decision

prompt_templates.title: Full extraction
prompt_templates.prompt: Use /learn to extract all valuable insights from our conversation into the appropriate knowledge files

output_examples.input: Use /learn to extract insights from our debugging session
Document the database migration quirk we found
output: - **Behavior:** Dropping tables fails if foreign keys exist

output_examples.input: Record our decision about the authentication approach
output: ## Decision: JWT with RS256 for API authentication

best_practices: Extract insights at natural stopping points during work sessions
Use high confidence for verified insights, medium for inferred patterns
Focus on project-specific knowledge, not generic programming concepts
anti_patterns: Extracting obvious or trivial information that adds no value
Recording insights without context or rationale
Skipping extraction because insights seem "too small" to document

faq.question: What tools does this skill support?
faq.answer: This skill works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code. It is designed for the Claude Router system.

faq.question: How many insights can I extract?
faq.answer: There is no hard limit. The skill processes all extractable insights from the current conversation context.

faq.question: Can I integrate this with other skills?
faq.answer: Yes. Use /learn-on for continuous extraction, then /learn to persist at session end.

faq.question: Is my data safe?
faq.answer: Yes. All data stays local in the knowledge/learnings/ directory. No data is sent externally.

faq.question: Why are my insights not appearing?
faq.answer: Check that knowledge/learnings/ directory exists. Low confidence insights are not used for routing decisions.

faq.question: How is this different from chat history?
faq.answer: Insights are structured, deduplicated, and survive context compaction. They persist across sessions permanently.
